evidence_in_dialogue: [[Catherine]] do you think our jane doe was buried alive ?
[[Andrew_Melton]] i married , uh , june about a year after svetlana left
[[Warrick]] all of the blood on svetlana 's sweatshirt was hers
[[Catherine]] svetlana 's blood was on the necklace worn by andrew melton 's current child bride
[[Andrew_Melton]] everywhere we went , men were making love to her with their eyes , defiling her with their thoughts
